record.title: DISMISSING ELECTION CONTEST RELATING TO OFFICE OF REPRESENTATIVE FROM FOURTH CONGRESSIONAL DISTRICT OF LOUISIANA

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent for the immediate consideration in the House of the resolution (H. Res. 462) dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Fourth Congressional District of Louisiana.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Pennsylvania?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
